short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your payment methods, checkout faster, and earn more rewards with H-E-B Credit for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The easiest way to earn 1.5% unlimited cash back on every online purchase with your H-E-B Visa Signature Credit Card.

With the new H-E-B Credit Card browser extension for Chrome, you can checkout with one-click, update your saved payment methods, and soon earn even more rewards.

‚úÖ GET CASH BACK WITH ONE CLICK
Forget about grabbing your card from your wallet every time you shop online. With the extension installed, all you need to do is login to your device (touch ID, face ID, password) and your card details will be pre-filled.

üîí SECURITY IS OUR HIGHEST PRIORITY
The H-E-B Credit Card browser extension for Chrome saves your card details to your
personal device, so you can check out on all e-commerce sites with your device password. Your card information never leaves your device. We use industry standard encryption secured by your device.

‚ú® SEAMLESSLY UPDATE YOUR SAVED PAYMENT METHODS ONLINE
The H-E-B Credit Card browser extension for Chrome saves your card details to your
personal device, so you can check out on all e-commerce sites with your device password.

AND MORE COMING SOON ‚û°‚û°‚û°‚û°

With our 2000 retail partners, you can earn boosted cashback rates from a wide range of retailers!
